description._content: Post a new reply to a group discussion topic.

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: group_id
argument._content: Pass in the group id to where the topic belongs. Can be NSID or group alias. Making this parameter optional for legacy reasons, but it is highly recommended to pass this in to get faster performance.

argument.name: topic_id
argument._content: The ID of the topic to post a comment to.

argument.name: message
argument._content: The message to post to the topic.

error._content: Either this account is not a member of the group, or discussion in this group is disabled.
The topic_id and message are required.
SSL is required to access the Flickr API.
The call required signing but no signature was sent.
The login details or auth token passed were invalid.
